details.description:
Monday to Thursday: 9am to 1pm and 2pm to 5:30pm 
Friday: 9am to 1pm

For any emergency involving a British citizen during holidays or out-of-office-hours, please contact +56 2 2370 4100 and your call will be properly re-directed.

You may also send an email to: consularenquiries.santi@fco.gov.uk
details.access_and_opening_times:
Address

Av. El Bosque Norte 0125 Las Condes Santiago, Chile

Tel: 56 2 2370 4100 Fax: 56 2 2370 4160

References:

Tobalaba Metro Station Public transport by Av. Apoquindo or Vitacura Avenues. Get off the bus or taxi on the corner of El Bosque Norte Street and Apoquindo Avenue.

Disabled access

The immediate vicinity around the Embassy building is well paved and accessible. Access to the consular area is via a public lift.

Opening hours

British Embassy

Monday to Thursday: 9am to 1pm and 2pm to 5:30pm Friday: 9am to 1pm

British Consulate

Monday to Thursday: 9am to 12pm: Submission of new applications for notarial services. BY APPOINTMENT ONLY. Consular Appointments Booking System

Friday: Closed for the public.

If you need consular assistance, please contact the British Consulate at consularenquiries.santi@fco.gov.uk

Embassy holidays for 2016

  • Friday 1 January
  • Friday 25 March
  • Monday 28 March
  • Monday 2 May
  • Thursday 27 June
  • Monday 15 August
  • Monday 29 August
  • Monday 19 September
  • Monday 10 October
  • Monday 31 October
  • Tuesday 1 November
  • Thursday 8 December
  • Monday 26 December
  • Tuesday 27 December

* Friday: Closed for the public.
